content.title: Terms of Service Agreement
content.introduction: Welcome to our application. By accessing or using our service, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service.

section1.title: 1. User Responsibilities
section1.content: Users are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of their account information and for all activities that occur under their account.

section2.title: 2. Acceptable Use
section2.content: You agree not to use the service for any illegal or unauthorized purpose. You must not violate any laws in your jurisdiction.

section3.title: 3. Intellectual Property
section3.content: All content included on this service, such as text, graphics, logos, and software, is the property of our company or its content suppliers and is protected by copyright laws.

section4.title: 4. Limitation of Liability
section4.content: Our company shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages resulting from the use or inability to use the service.

section5.title: 5. Changes to Terms
section5.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Your continued use of the service following the posting of changes constitutes your acceptance of those changes.

content.conclusion: Thank you for using our service. If you have any questions about these terms, please contact us.
